value.title: Amazon Will Let Companies Build Voice Assistants on Alexa
value.excerpt: Amazon.com Inc. is offering other companies the ability to use the building blocks of the Alexa digital assistant for their own automated versions, the latest effort to embed the company’s voice software into other devices.

value.title: AI-Powered Text From This Program Could Fool the Government
value.excerpt: A Harvard medical student submitted auto-generated comments to Medicaid; volunteers couldn’t distinguish them from those penned by humans.

value.title: AI set to replace humans in cybersecurity by 2030, says Trend Micro

value.title: Smart collar translates dog barks into emotions, startup company says
